name: Sentab
description: With Sentab it has never been easier to Share Life. Chat for free to friends & family, face-to-face across the globe, send them an instant message without charge and share your holiday snaps or videos of important life events. Sentab makes the world smaller and more social, all at the end of your fingertips.  Features:  Voice calls  Chat for as long as you like, without worrying about using up your call allowance or cross network charges. All our calls are completely free of charge.  Video calls  See your loved ones faces as you chat, in high definition and free of charge.  Instant messaging  Send messages app to app, app to PC, or even app to TV!  Photo & video sharing  Create albums and share your photos & videos with your friends & family. No need to worry about email limits or MMS charges, your media can be accessed by those you choose to share with in mere moments.   *Operator data charges may apply. We recommend using a WiFi connection or an unlimited data plan for video & voice calls.
